discourse_list.title: Schelling Point Event at ETHDenver 2/17/2022 [REQUEST FOR COORDINATION]

content.content: GitcoinDAO is putting together Schelling Point - a one-day celebration of public goods & DAO-era coordination - the day before ETHDenver 2022 (2/17/2022).  We’d love your help in planning this event! We have about 3 months until the event, and so far we’ve got proposals for the following lined up:  venue content art studio  but we are still looking for proposals from the community for the following:  cool swag ways to engage around the following memes: schellling points, green pill, quadratic lands, solarpunk, regen finance, coordination ways to market coordination.party (Moonshot Collectives new product suite) novel ways to show off Ethereum’s values. other creative proposals   Want to sponsor the event? Email sales@gitcoin.co if you’d like to sponsor the event (or the Virtual Event).  Want to help plan? Want to co-create a great event?  and have fun while doing it of course… The DAO is co-creating the event in these places.    Join us!  a telegram group a weekly planning meeting on 9am MST on Thursdays a gitcoin Bounty for Swag design   FD4GHmPVcAAwufb890×621 159 KB  Take the greenpill anon; help us coordinate the best event that the coordination-space has ever seen…

Will this be one of the mini conferences? EthDenver’s opening day seems to be on the 17th. From EthDenver:  THURSDAY, FEB 17 8AM - 5PM : Open Source Coworking & MiniCons 5:30PM : ETHDenver Main Event Opening Ceremony
0xPetra:  Will this be one of the mini conferences?   yes, thats right.  it will be one of the “minicons” at ethdenver 2/17
do you need spare hands at Schelling Point? I will be available that day to help volunteering!
Yeah I am available for that as well!  Good call jchecton.

Thanks for the offer! I imagine we will definitely need some support day of. We will have lots of swag, a plinko board, etc. that could all use some manning. Want to send me a DM in discord and I can try to help coordinate a Boots on the Ground group?
